description: Made out of the hopes and dreams of men.
name: Cute Maid Clothes

description: Centuries of maid sewing techniques have culminated in this pinnacle of maid outfit technology: an year-round outfit that can be transformed to fit any weather or season.
name: Cute Maid Adv. Uniform (summer form)

use_action.msg: You modify the maid outfit to better protect against the cold.

description: Centuries of maid sewing techniques have culminated in this pinnacle of maid outfit technology: an year-round outfit that can be transformed to fit any weather or season.
name: Cute Maid Adv. Uniform (winter form)

use_action.msg: You modify the maid outfit to better protect against the heat.

description: The standard maid uniform may not be enough to survive in this dangerous new world. This improved version, while still appearing cute and frilly on the outside, actually conceals an advanced armor liner and climate control systems to better endure even the harshest environments.
name: Cute Maid Uniform LSS-PRO (off)

use_action.msg: You activate the uniform's heating mode.
use_action.need_charges_msg: メイド服の電力が不足しています。

use_action.msg: You activate the uniform's cooling mode.
use_action.need_charges_msg: メイド服の電力が不足しています。

use_action.msg: You turn off the uniform's climate control systems.

description: A uniform with longer sleeves and skirt, better suited for winter.
name: Cute Victorian Maid Clothes

description: A pure white wedding dress.
name: Cute Wedding Dress

description: A nun's habit for serving God that gives off a sacred aura.
name: Cute Nun Habit

description: A transparent raincoat made from very thin vinyl, very popular with maids who want to be fashionable in rainy weather. The material is thin enough that the entire coat can fold away into a pocket when not in use.
name: Cute Transparent Raincoat (hood on)

use_action.msg: You take off the hood.

description: A transparent raincoat made from very thin vinyl, very popular with maids who want to be fashionable in rainy wather. The material is thin enough that the entire coat can fold away into a pocket when not in use.
name: Cute Transparent Raincoat (hood off)

use_action.msg: You put on the hood.

description: One of the most important parts of the maid uniform. It is forbidden for maids to take it off, regardless of weather. Trained maids can channel their spirit into it to keep their heads warm during winter. (Toggle to change warmth)

use_action.msg: Your pride as a maid prevents the cold from bothering your head.

description: One of the most important parts of the maid uniform. It is forbidden for maids to take it off, regardless of weather. Trained maids can channel their spirit into it to keep their heads warm during winter. (Toggle to change warmth)
name: Cute Maid Headdress

use_action.msg: You stop channeling your spirit into te headpiece

description: One of the most important parts of the maid unifrom is the headdress. This one contains an electrical thermal system powedered using batteries. It lets you feel like a maid despite how it looks.
name: Cute Thermal Maid Headdress (off)

use_action.msg: You activate the headdress' heating systems
use_action.need_charges_msg: %sのバッテリーが不足しています。

description: One of the most important parts of the maid unifrom is the headdress. This one contains an electrical thermal system powedered using batteries. It lets you feel like a maid despite how it looks.

description: A maid must maintain her pride and attends to her duties, no matter how harsh the situation or environment. The headdress is not just a piece of the uniform, it's a symbol of a maid's pride.

description: These advanced glasses are not only capable of functioning as night vision or infared scanners, but protects against bright flashes, can withstand chemical corrosion, and can even completely block light for sleeping in bright places.
